name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: What a special moment for the United States. Think of all the young women watching today who will be inspired. I’m inspired. #JusticeJackson

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: With our civil and reproductive rights, freedom from pollution and gun violence, and entitlement to a vibrant democracy on the line, I am heartened Justice Jackson will be on the frontline standing up for all of them.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: This is the most conservative Supreme Court in over a century. Justice Jackson’s voice will be critical to halting the radicalism of right wing, partisan justices bent on imposing a dangerous vision of the world.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: For decades, SCOTUS has lacked balance: balance in gender, balance in race, balance in life experience, balance in perspective, balance in judicial compassion and moderation. Justice Jackson’s elevation will help restore needed balance in ways that could benefit generations.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: In a time of great cynicism, today’s confirmation of Justice Ketanji Brown Jackson to America’s highest court is a bright moment for our country.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: Ultimately, every member of Congress must share the goal of improving the lives of their constituents. The #BuildBackBetter plan is our once-in-a-generation opportunity to deliver for the people, and that’s why it has my support.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: With 535 members, no senator or representative can expect any bill to be drafted for their interests alone. What we are seeing in Washington is the crafting of transformational legislation that has buy-in from members from Arizona to Maine, West Virginia to California.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: #BuildBackBetter is about tax fairness – the bill will make billionaires and corporations pay their rightful share while giving middle-class taxpayers the economic relief they’ve long needed.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text:
There has been a dishonest focus on the price tag of #BuildBackBetter but the truth is: we have a plan to pay for it entirely.

Yes, you read that right. This bill will roll back the irresponsible Trump tax cuts that went to big business & the wealthiest Americans.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: As a Maine islander and farmer, I’ve seen how the unmitigated #climate crisis is impacting our lands. Simply put, we must invest in climate resilience now, or our kids will suffer droughts, floods, fires & scarcity in a terrifying way we’ve never known.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: #BuildBackBetter will put the country on the fast track to a 100% clean-energy future by making historic investments in public transit systems and union-made electric vehicles.

tweet_text:
in·fra·struc·ture: (noun) structures needed for society to operate.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: The #JusticeInPolicingAct would end qualified immunity. All too often it has been abused by law enforcement to evade consequences for the brutal use of excessive force. Denying civilians their constitutional rights to shield an officer from penalties is unjust.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: After the murder of George Floyd, there was prolonged outcry for accountability & reforms to curb police brutality. While there’s no single bill that will erase generations of racial profiling or excessive force, #JusticeinPolicingAct is a critical step to rein in future abuses.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: The vast majority of police do their jobs honorably and put themselves in harm’s way to keep us safe. But we cannot overlook egregious cases of misconduct or our country’s long history of racial profiling and mistreatment of Black Americans by law enforcement.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: Tonight I am voting for the second time to pass the #JusticeinPolicing Act which will ban the barbaric use of chokeholds and no-knock warrants and end the court-invented qualified immunity shield.

tweet_text: H.R. 3981 would create an easily understood food date labeling system—“BEST If Used By” to communicate that the quality of the food product may begin to deteriorate after the date & “USE By” to communicate the estimated shelf life after which the product should not be consumed.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: Date labeling regulations are left up to states, which means consumers are left trying to sort out a patchwork of confounding terms. “Sell by,” “use by,” “freshest on,” and “expires on” are just a few of the phrases currently being used on food products.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: 40% of all food produced in the U.S. is wasted, costing our nation $161 billion annually. It is estimated that if all food waste represented an individual country, it would be the third largest emitter of greenhouse gases globally.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: ~90% of Americans prematurely throw out perfectly safe food, in part because of confusion about what date labels mean, meanwhile 38.4M Americans are food insecure. H.R. 3981 would to reduce confusion & make sure no one is going hungry or inadvertently hurting our environment.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: We do not have another day to waste on the Senate GOP's corporate bailout plan. This is a time to lift up and support the working people and small businesses hardest hit by the toll of this crisis and the House’s third #coronavirus response bill does just that.

name: Congresswoman Chellie Pingree 🇺🇸 🇺🇦
tweet_text: 3 years ago Republicans in Congress and Pres. Trump gave a multi-trillion dollar tax cut to corporations which resulted in some of the biggest stock buy backs in history + further consolidation of corporate power. We cannot use this perilous moment to make the same mistakes.
